title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in Type Hierarchy does nothing
description: When attempting to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, no action is taken. The expected behavior is either the menu option should be removed or, preferably, selecting the option should add Javadoc to the field.
OB: From the context menu, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option for a field in the Type Hierarchy view does nothing.
EB: From the context menu, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option for a field in the Type Hierarchy view should add Javadoc to the field.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Type Hierarchy view. 2. Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view.
